channel.title: Make your very first server in 5 minutes!
channel.description:
Edit: PLEASE don't post anything unless you have ACTUALY tried the program. Your just telling people who have been trying to make a server for months not to try this and letting them ask you how to make a server like a million times more! If you decide to hate on me atleast try it! [b][u][size=50pt]Your Server[/size][/u][/b] [size=25pt][u][b]By Fanz[/b][/u][/size] Your server is a program I made in 2 and a half hours. I was thinking about how moparscape has its own start server thing and how it didn't work to what it should. So I just spent 2 and a half hours to help new people make their very first server with only one file that I like to call "Your Server". This file includes the server and the client that you will be using and clear instructions to turn your server online and also includes some guides. Even though it wasn't hard to make, im sure it will help hundreds of new people to make their own very first server! Im not going to include pictures considering YOUR SERVER'S may very to how you code them but without coding a thing it will look like delta. I would like to credit the following: DeltaScape (server base) Webber (client base) Bakatool (helped with server base) Winten (helped with server base) Fanz (put everything together into your server) If you get the point and want to make YOUR VERY OWN SERVER in just 5 minutes download this: [size=15pt][url=http://download126.mediafire.com/omfqxjt9nmdg/2hogy25ot3a/Your+server.rar]http://download126.mediafire.com/omfqxjt9nmdg/2hogy25ot3a/Your+server.rar[/url][/size] [size=13pt][u][b]If it works for you with no problem please post a reply and if it doesn't work please say so.[/b][/u][/size] -Fanz [quote="TabbyKiller"]Well I know theres nothing really bad on there because its a Medafile Download...[/quote] And heres a virus scan: [quote="UpdaterScape"]I will post a virus scan of it if u guys a bit touchy *UPDATE* Picture Of Scan McAfee [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/dfe3a.jpg[/img][/quote] This was taken by GAILORD from google he is a mod there =p
There isnt a virus in this.. [IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/4771/49521837.png[/img]

item.title: Make your very first server in 5 minutes!
item.dc:creator: @xhoffmanz xhoffmanz
item.description:
@xhoffmanz wrote:

[quote=“Xi ShiFt iX, post:125, topic:286767”][quote author=xhoffmanz link=topic=379237.msg3847591#msg3847591 date=1323741519]
hi i need help with this. Yes I have tried the server and i love it . I have just a couple questions

  1. How do i change the name of it to what i want it to b/ change title screen pic.
  2. How do i put it online so i can tell other people the link to my server made by this because if i give them regular link they will just download actual server for themselves.
  3. What are the best wepons on the wepon id list?
  4. how do i get rid of the fanz stuff eg. Please remember to vote your server on google/moparscape and how do i change the your server part to what i want it to b.
  5. how do i add different teleports.
  6. what are all the commands?

Thanks you for reading this comment i will work on this server a lot and when i kno how other people can use it it willl b called Hoffscape.
[/quote]
1). Do that in the cache sprites folder.
2). Portforward port 43594 and use your IP to put online.
3). Go on itemdb.biz
4). In client.java
5). Tutorials all on moparscape.
6). Search ‘commands’ in folder and look at them all.[/quote]

  1. Where is the cache sprites folder?
  2. how do i find my ip??
  3. How in client do i do it?
  4. when i click the commands thing it just shows the commands ive done.

Read full topic
item.source: Make your very first server in 5 minutes!

item.title: Make your very first server in 5 minutes!
item.dc:creator: @Xi_ShiFt_iX Xi ShiFt iX
item.description:
@Xi_ShiFt_iX wrote:

[quote=“xhoffmanz, post:122, topic:286767”]hi i need help with this. Yes I have tried the server and i love it . I have just a couple questions

  1. How do i change the name of it to what i want it to b/ change title screen pic.
  2. How do i put it online so i can tell other people the link to my server made by this because if i give them regular link they will just download actual server for themselves.
  3. What are the best wepons on the wepon id list?
  4. how do i get rid of the fanz stuff eg. Please remember to vote your server on google/moparscape and how do i change the your server part to what i want it to b.
  5. how do i add different teleports.
  6. what are all the commands?

Thanks you for reading this comment i will work on this server a lot and when i kno how other people can use it it willl b called Hoffscape.[/quote]
1). Do that in the cache sprites folder.
2). Portforward port 43594 and use your IP to put online.
3). Go on itemdb.biz
4). In client.java
5). Tutorials all on moparscape.
6). Search ‘commands’ in folder and look at them all.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @flypaper333 flypaper333
item.description:
@flypaper333 wrote:

Cool Kiid:

First of all… Your virus scan means nothing McAfee fails at life. You didn’t even show us the files you scanned. I doubt it has no virus… Anyway. I don’t understand how people can’t port forward. There’s like 100+guides. Allow 43594 pings to your router, register a no-ip create a no-ip and you’re fucking done. Most people port forward correctly there just to dumb to realize they are trying to ping into there own no-ip.

thats microsoft scanner >.> calm urself, i posted that to warn other members, to HELP other members… now calm down troll

Read full topic
